revision.text:
<!--학술지_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = AcademicJournal
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 표지 | ontologyProperty = picture }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = editor | ontologyProperty = editor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 분야 | ontologyProperty = academicDiscipline }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 축약 | ontologyProperty = abbreviation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출판사 | ontologyProperty = publisher }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = ISSN | ontologyProperty = issn }}
end}}
 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|출판내역 =
-->
